pkgmetadata.longdescription: Meta package for standard joetoo setup on a single board computer (sbc) Optionally uses dev-embedded/joetoo-meta::joetoo Boot firmware installation (via boot-fw) is functional for Rasberry Pi boards, but it is not yet impmented for rockchip boards That may also be moved in the future, to a package that installs the kernel kernel, modules, firmware, device tree, bootloader, etc.

use.flag: Tailor for Raspberry Pi 3 B Plus (armv8/64)
Install boot config files and baseline packages
Install joetoo-meta package and its dependencies
Install raspi or rockchip bootloader, boot firmware
